entities.name: beetle
entities.description: The beetle is described as being given exercise by Harry. It scuttles over the desk top and avoids his wand.

entities.name: wand
entities.description: Ron's wand is described as being damaged beyond repair, crackling and sparking at odd moments. It also causes thick grey smoke to engulf Ron when he tries to transfigure the beetle.

entities.name: Professor McGonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is mentioned as not being pleased with Ron's situation.

entities.name: Harry
entities.description: Harry is described as relieved to hear the lunch bell and suggests that Ron write home for another wand.

entities.name: Ron
entities.description: Ron is described as having problems with his wand, which he has patched up with borrowed Spellota pe. He also accidentally squashes the beetle with his elbow.

relationships.description: Harry is giving exercise to the beetle, which scuttles over the desk top and avoids his wand.
Ron has a damaged wand that he has patched up with borrowed Spellota pe.
Harry is in Professor McGonagall's class, as evidenced by the fact that he and Ron are still in the classroom when everyone else has left.
Like Harry, Ron is also in Professor McGonagall's class.
Harry suggests that Ron write home for another wand, indicating that he is trying to help his friend.
